mapper.insert: insert into play_list(pl_name, pl_comment, u_id) values (#{pl_name}, #{pl_comment}, #{u_id})
mapper.select: SELECT M.pl_id, M.pl_name, M.pl_comment, (case when M.pl_good_count IS NULL then 0 ELSE M.pl_good_count end) AS pl_good_count, M.plc_id, M.vh_id, M.vh_comment, M.vh_score, M.ve_id, N.v_id, N.v_title, N.v_director, N.v_actors, N.g_name, N.gd_name, N.ve_episode_num FROM(SELECT C.pl_id, C.pl_name, C.pl_comment, C.u_id, C.pl_good_count, F.plc_id, F.vh_id, F.vh_comment, F.vh_score, F.ve_id FROM (SELECT A.pl_id, A.pl_name, A.pl_comment, A.u_id, B.pl_good_count FROM play_list A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT pl_id, COUNT(*) AS pl_good_count FROM play_list_good GROUP BY pl_id) B ON A.pl_id = B.pl_id WHERE A.pl_id = #{pl_id}) C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT D.plc_id, D.pl_id, D.vh_id, E.vh_comment, E.vh_score, E.ve_id FROM play_list_contents D LEFT OUTER JOIN vod_history E ON D.vh_id = E.vh_id) F ON C.pl_id = F.pl_id) M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT K.*, L.ve_id, L.ve_episode_num FROM (SELECT I.*, J.g_name FROM (SELECT G.v_id, G.v_title, G.v_director, G.v_actors, H.gd_id, H.gd_name, H.g_id FROM vod G LEFT OUTER JOIN genre_detail H ON G.gd_id = H.gd_id) I LEFT OUTER JOIN genre J ON I.g_id = J.g_id) K LEFT OUTER JOIN vod_episode L ON K.v_id = L.v_id) N ON M.ve_id = N.ve_id

SELECT O.*, P.u_nickname, P.u_profile_pic FROM (SELECT M.pl_id, M.pl_name, M.pl_comment, (case when M.pl_good_count IS NULL then 0 ELSE M.pl_good_count end) AS pl_good_count, M.u_id, M.plc_id, M.vh_id, M.vh_comment, M.vh_score, M.ve_id, N.v_id, N.v_title, N.v_director, N.v_actors, N.v_poster, N.g_name, N.gd_name, N.ve_episode_num FROM(SELECT C.pl_id, C.pl_name, C.pl_comment, C.u_id, C.pl_good_count, F.plc_id, F.vh_id, F.vh_comment, F.vh_score, F.ve_id FROM (SELECT A.pl_id, A.pl_name, A.pl_comment, A.u_id, B.pl_good_count FROM play_list A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT pl_id, COUNT(*) AS pl_good_count FROM play_list_good GROUP BY pl_id) B ON A.pl_id = B.pl_id WHERE A.pl_id = #{pl_id}) C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT D.plc_id, D.pl_id, D.vh_id, E.vh_comment, E.vh_score, E.ve_id FROM play_list_contents D LEFT OUTER JOIN vod_history E ON D.vh_id = E.vh_id) F ON C.pl_id = F.pl_id) M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT K.*, L.ve_id, L.ve_episode_num FROM (SELECT I.*, J.g_name FROM (SELECT G.v_id, G.v_title, G.v_director, G.v_actors, G.v_poster, H.gd_id, H.gd_name, H.g_id FROM vod G LEFT OUTER JOIN genre_detail H ON G.gd_id = H.gd_id) I LEFT OUTER JOIN genre J ON I.g_id = J.g_id) K LEFT OUTER JOIN vod_episode L ON K.v_id = L.v_id) N ON M.ve_id = N.ve_id) O left outer join member P ON O.u_id = P.u_id
select pl_id as plb_id, COUNT(pl_id) as plb_cnt, RANK() Over (ORDER BY count(pl_id) desc) plb_rank from play_list_good GROUP BY pl_id ORDER BY count(pl_id) DESC LIMIT 10 ;

SELECT B.v_title, B.ve_episode_num, A.vh_comment FROM (SELECT ve_id, vh_comment FROM vod_history WHERE vh_id = (SELECT vh_id FROM play_list_contents WHERE plc_id = #{plc_id})) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT C.ve_id, C.ve_episode_num, D.v_title FROM vod_episode C LEFT OUTER JOIN vod D ON C.v_id = D.v_id) B ON A.ve_id = B.ve_id;
